TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Rect3D extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示一个三维矩形：例如立方体。

span.span: Represents a 3-D rectangle: for example, a cube.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义为一个位置 () 以及大小结构 ()。 is defined as a location () and a size structure (). 因为， ，和大小为指定的值为大量度和不坐标，它们不能为负除在情况下为空矩形。Because the , , and values specified for the size are magnitudes and not coordinates, they cannot be negative except in the case of an empty rectangle. 指定为空矩形，它具有， ，和的-无穷大值。An empty rectangle is specified by , which has , , and values of -Infinity. 此结构通常用于表示的边界或。This structure is typically used to represent the bounds of a or . 和不通常会使用在 XAML 中，因为在使用这些类型的 WPF 三维对象模型中不存在任何可设置属性。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回一个空其 X、 Y 和 Z 值为正无穷大，其大小值为负无穷大。This property returns an empty whose X, Y, and Z values are positive-infinity and whose size values are negative infinity. 这是唯一的情况，在何种大小值可以是负数。This is the only situation in which size values can be negative. 通常用于表示的边界或。 is typically used to represent the bounds of a or .

span.span: that represents the origin of the , typically the back bottom left corner.
The default value is (0,0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，在三维的坐标系统中，正 Y 轴向上箭头 (假设的照相机的属性为正)。Note that in the 3-D coordinate system, the positive Y axis points up (assuming that the camera's property is positive). 因此，此属性通常表示后左下的角的场景中。Therefore, this property usually represents the back bottom left corner of the in the scene. 通常用于表示的边界或。 is typically used to represent the bounds of a or . 和不通常会使用在 XAML 中，因为在使用这些类型的 WPF 三维对象模型中不存在任何可设置属性。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types.

span.span: Sets the offset translation of the to the provided value, specified as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常用于表示的边界或。 is typically used to represent the bounds of a or . 请注意，调用方法只会造成影响，如果可以更改， ，和直接属性。Note that calling the method will only have an effect if you can change the , , and properties directly. 因为是值类型，如果引用对象使用的属性或索引，你将获得一份对象，未对对象的引用。Because is a value type, if you reference a object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object. 如果你尝试更改， ，或上的属性或索引器的引用，则编译器将发生错误。If you attempt to change , , or on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs. 同样，调用属性或索引器上将不会更改基础对象。Similarly, calling on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object. 如果你想要更改的值引用为属性或索引器，创建一个新修改其字段，然后将分配回属性或索引器。If you want to change the value of a that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new , modify its fields, and then assign the back to the property or indexer.
